divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from work at about 10:10 pm on June 8, 2013, noticed what at first looked like a very large orange Big Dipper consellation. Being very curious, I stopped in the driveway and observed a group of objects traveling at a very slow speed from south toward north. As I watched, the dipper shape began to change and sevealr addition shapes started to appear to the south of the first grouping. I watched it travel across the sky for about 40 minutes and it started to fade out. I was able to capture a photo on my smartphone and have attached it. A very strange feeling indeed. Love to have some idea of what it could have been. I noticed on the internet several other people saw the same thing. Get's on to wondering. Bill
Summary: 9 to ten cigar shapped objects glowing orange, moving very, very slowly toward NE
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around June 8th 2013
